      • and

        public void and(Bitmap other)
        Description copied from interface: Bitmap
        and: bitmap -> bitmap = (bitmap & other). Assumes the bit length of the other bitmap is AT LEAST as large as the bit length of this bitmap.
        Specified by:
        and in interface Bitmap

      • bitCount

        Description copied from interface: Bitmap
        Returns the number of bits set in the bitmap.
        Specified by:

      • comparableInstance

        public Bitmap comparableInstance(Bitmap other)
        Description copied from interface: Bitmap
        Returns a bitmap instance with the same number of bits as this bitmap. If other has fewer bits than this bitmap, the output bitmap is 0-padded and has the same integer value as other. If other has more bits than this bitmap, the output bitmap is the result of truncating the highest bits of other.
        Specified by:
        comparableInstance in interface Bitmap
        Returns:
        copy of the this bitmap

      • compareTo

        Specified by:

      • copy

        public Bitmap copy()
        Description copied from interface: Bitmap
        Creates an instance-compatible copy of this bitmap. This bitmap and the returned bitmap are both instances of the same class.
        Specified by:
        copy in interface Bitmap
        Returns:
        copy of the this bitmap
